HomePage.title: Create Stories for Kids with Our AI Generator in Seconds
HomePage.subtitle: Your imagination and AI come together to turn a few words into a personalized children‚Äôs book with AI, filled with magical illustrations.
HomePage.step1Description: Upload a photo, create a magical version of yourself, your pet, or anyone you want ‚Äî and as many characters as you can imagine!
HomePage.step2Title: 2. Choose which character will appear in your story
HomePage.step2Description: Pick from your own characters or use Cuentia‚Äôs presets. Mix and match freely!
HomePage.step3Title: 3. Write key points and the learning objective
HomePage.step3Description: Let your imagination run wild! Add key plot points, a learning goal, and your personal touch. Add as many images as you want!
HomePage.step4Title: 4. Add final customization details to your book
HomePage.step4Description: Add a special dedication and a back cover image to make it even more unique.
HomePage.findStoriestitle: üåç Find more stories in your language here! üåç
HomePage.noStories: There are no stories in the community yet.
HomePage.faq1Answer: Upload several photos and our AI generates a cartoon character you can use in your stories.
HomePage.faq2Answer: Credits are Cuentia‚Äôs currency to generate stories and illustrations.
HomePage.faq3Question: Do you offer free children‚Äôs stories in PDF?
HomePage.faq3Answer: You can download as many children‚Äôs books in free PDF format as you want to try the experience before creating your own personalized stories.
HomePage.faq4Question: How many credits to create a story?
HomePage.faq4Answer: A basic story without illustrations starts at 400 credits. If you want illustrations, you can generate an illustrated book from 900 credits.
HomePage.finalCtaDescription: Join Cuentia and start bringing your stories to life.

CreateStoryPage.createStoryDescription: Transform your ideas into a children‚Äôs book created with AI, where every page comes to life with magical illustrations. You can also create children‚Äôs stories with AI or generate custom book illustrations from your own text in just seconds.

CreateStoryPage.languageTip: üí° Tip: We recommend writing the details in the same language you'll generate the story in, so the result is more natural and accurate.
CreateStoryPage.plotPointsLabel: Be creative! Describe what you want to happen in the story, the relationship between the characters, or the settings where the story takes place.
CreateStoryPage.plotPointsPlaceholder: Leo, who is the protagonist, goes on a trip with his grandmother Maria and meets a girl (Ana) who will become his best friend. The story should take place on a beach.
CreateStoryPage.learningObjectivePlaceholder: Ex: Teach Leo the importance of friendship and teamwork.

LegalPage.title: Legal Notice
LegalPage.content:
This Legal Notice regulates access to and use of the website https://cuentia.net (hereinafter, the ‚ÄúWebsite‚Äù), owned by NATUTECH S.L. By browsing or using the Website, the user accepts this Legal Notice.

1. Identification of the Owner
The Website is owned by:
NATUTECH S.L.
CIF: B24793663
Registered address: Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 2, 46015, Val√®ncia (Valencia), Spain.
Contact email: cuentia@cuentia.net
Trade name used on the Website: ‚ÄúCuentia‚Äù.

2. Purpose of the Legal Notice
This Legal Notice regulates the conditions of access, browsing, and use of the Website. Access to the Website implies full acceptance of these conditions.

3. Website Content
The Website includes texts, designs, visual elements, interface, structure and functionalities developed by NATUTECH S.L. and may not be copied.
User-generated content is not affected. Stories created through the platform, including text, images and AI-generated illustrations, belong entirely to the user, who may use them freely for any purpose, including printing, publishing, sharing or commercial use.
The user may not copy or reuse the Website‚Äôs software, design, or structure.

4. Use of the Website
The user agrees to use the Website lawfully and respectfully. In particular, the user agrees not to:
‚Ä¢ Upload illegal, offensive, or rights-infringing content.
‚Ä¢ Upload photos without having obtained the necessary permissions from the individuals appearing in them.
‚Ä¢ Carry out actions that may damage, overload, or affect the technical functioning of the Website.
‚Ä¢ Attempt to access restricted areas or data belonging to other users.

5. User Responsibility
The user is responsible for the accuracy of the data and files uploaded to the Website. NATUTECH S.L. may remove content or close accounts that violate these conditions or compromise service security.

6. Responsibility of NATUTECH S.L.
NATUTECH S.L. does not guarantee continuous availability of the Website nor the absence of technical errors. AI-generated content may include variations or inexact results. NATUTECH S.L. shall not be liable for damages arising from the use of the Website, service interruptions, or unexpected AI-generated outcomes.

7. External Links
The Website may include links to third-party sites. NATUTECH S.L. is not responsible for the content or functioning of such external sites.

8. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
This Legal Notice is governed by Spanish law. For any dispute related to the use of the Website, both parties submit to the courts and tribunals of Val√®ncia, unless mandatory law states otherwise.

9. Contact
For any inquiries related to this Legal Notice, you may contact:
NATUTECH S.L.
Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 22, 46015, Val√®ncia (Valencia), Spain.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.content:
This Privacy Policy explains how NATUTECH S.L. (hereinafter, ‚ÄúCuentia‚Äù, ‚Äúwe‚Äù, or ‚Äúour‚Äù) collects, uses and protects the personal data of users who access the website https://cuentia.net (hereinafter, the ‚ÄúWebsite‚Äù). By using Cuentia, you accept this Privacy Policy.

1. Data Controller
NATUTECH S.L.
CIF: B24793663
Address: Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 2, 46015, Val√®ncia (Valencia), Spain.
Contact email: cuentia@cuentia.net.
Trade name used: Cuentia.

2. Data We Collect
Cuentia collects only the data necessary to provide its service:
‚Ä¢ Registration data: email and password (encrypted).
‚Ä¢ Data provided by the user: story title, descriptions, text, character names and any written information used to create the story.
‚Ä¢ Photos uploaded by the user to generate characters using AI.
‚Ä¢ Technical data: IP address, device, session identifiers and basic usage necessary for platform functionality.
‚Ä¢ Payment data processed by Stripe (we do not store card information).

3. Purpose of Processing
Data is used exclusively to:
‚Ä¢ Create and manage the user account.
‚Ä¢ Generate personalized AI characters.
‚Ä¢ Create digital stories in PDF format.
‚Ä¢ Send notifications related to the story or the account (e.g., ‚Äúyour story is ready‚Äù).
‚Ä¢ Permanently store PDFs and generated images so the user can access them at any time.
‚Ä¢ Manage payments, billing and subscriptions.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the security and correct functioning of the Website.
Cuentia does not sell, rent or transfer user data to third parties.

4. Processing of Photos and Uploaded Content
Photos uploaded to generate characters are processed as follows:
‚Ä¢ Stored for a maximum of 24 hours in a temporary space.
‚Ä¢ After generating character images, the original photos are automatically deleted.
‚Ä¢ Photos are used exclusively to create AI illustrations.
‚Ä¢ The generated character images (not the original photos) are stored permanently for future use.
The user guarantees they have the rights and permissions to upload such photos, including parental/guardian consent for minors.

5. Legal Basis for Processing
We process personal data based on:
‚Ä¢ Contract performance: creation of the account, story generation and PDF delivery.
‚Ä¢ Consent: use of photos to generate AI characters.
‚Ä¢ Legitimate interest: improving and securing the Website‚Äôs technical operation.
‚Ä¢ Legal obligation: billing and tax compliance.

6. Data Retention
‚Ä¢ Uploaded photos: up to 24 hours, then deleted.
‚Ä¢ AI-generated character images: stored permanently until deleted by the user.
‚Ä¢ Generated PDFs: stored permanently until deleted.
‚Ä¢ Account data: stored while the account remains active.
If the user deletes their account, data will be irreversibly deleted except data required by law.

7. Data Processors and Transfers
Service providers used:
‚Ä¢ AWS S3: storage of PDFs and images.
‚Ä¢ Firebase / Firestore: account and database management.
‚Ä¢ Stripe: payment processing.
‚Ä¢ AI systems (OpenAI or others): text and image generation.

Some providers are outside the EU. Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) apply.

8. User Rights
The user may:
‚Ä¢ Access their data.
‚Ä¢ Rectify inaccurate data.
‚Ä¢ Request deletion of data.
‚Ä¢ Object to processing.
‚Ä¢ Restrict processing.
‚Ä¢ Request portability.
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent.
To exercise rights: cuentia@cuentia.net.
They may also contact the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD).

9. Data Security
Measures applied:
‚Ä¢ HTTPS encryption.
‚Ä¢ Encrypted passwords.
‚Ä¢ Secure servers.
‚Ä¢ Restricted access.
No system is 100% infallible, but we apply strict measures.

10. Account and Data Deletion
When deleting the account:
‚Ä¢ PDFs are erased.
‚Ä¢ Generated images are erased.
‚Ä¢ Registration data is deleted.
‚Ä¢ Temporary photos are deleted.
Data required by law is kept as permitted.

11. Changes to this Policy
Cuentia may update this Policy when necessary. The current version will always be available at https://cuentia.net.

12. Contact
NATUTECH S.L.
Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 2, 46015, Val√®ncia (Valencia), Spain.
Email: cuentia@cuentia.net.

TermsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsPage.content:
Last updated: 30/11/2025

1. Identity of the Provider

This document regulates access and use of the website https://cuentia.net (hereinafter, the ‚ÄúWebsite‚Äù), as well as the contracting of services offered through it.

The Website is owned by:

NATUTECH S.L.
CIF: B24793663
Registered address: Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 2, 46015, Val√®ncia (Valencia), Spain
Contact email: cuentia@cuentia.net
Trade name: Cuentia

In these Terms and Conditions, ‚ÄúNATUTECH‚Äù, ‚ÄúCuentia‚Äù, ‚Äúwe‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù refer to NATUTECH S.L.
‚ÄúUser‚Äù, ‚Äúyou‚Äù or ‚Äúclient‚Äù refers to any person who browses, uses or contracts services through the Website.

By accessing, registering or using the Website, you declare that you have read and accepted these Terms and Conditions.

‚∏ª

2. Purpose of the Service

Cuentia is a digital platform that allows Users to:
1. Register with email and password.
2. Create personalized characters by uploading photos (e.g., of themselves or others, including minors) and assigning them a name.
3. Write the story information (title, plot, learning objectives, description, characters, etc.).
4. Generate, through artificial intelligence, a children's digital story in PDF format including text and illustrations based on the provided information.

‚∏ª

3. User Registration and Account

3.1. Requirements
To use the platform and generate stories, the User must create an account with:
‚Ä¢ Email address
‚Ä¢ Password

The User guarantees that the information provided is truthful and must keep it updated.

3.2. Account Responsibility
The User is responsible for:
‚Ä¢ The confidentiality of their password
‚Ä¢ Access to their account
‚Ä¢ Any activity carried out through it

In case of unauthorized use, the User must immediately notify Cuentia.

‚∏ª

4. Minimum Age of Use

The Website is intended for users over 14 years old.
If the User is under 14, they must use the platform with verifiable parental or guardian consent.

Parents or guardians are responsible for the use made and for the content generated.

‚∏ª

5. Process of Creating Characters and Stories

5.1. Uploading Photos
The User may upload:
‚Ä¢ Their own photo(s)
‚Ä¢ Photos of family members or third parties, including minors

The User declares and guarantees:
‚Ä¢ They have the necessary rights and permissions to upload them
‚Ä¢ They have the consent of the individuals appearing in them (or their guardians)

Photos are used exclusively to generate AI illustrations.

5.2. AI Content Generation
The User understands and accepts that:
‚Ä¢ AI-generated images are artistic interpretations, not photorealistic representations.
‚Ä¢ There may be variations, imperfections or unexpected results inherent to the technology.
‚Ä¢ Final quality depends on the information provided by the User.

This is not considered a product defect.

‚∏ª

6. Nature of the Digital Product

The final product is a downloadable PDF file, available:
‚Ä¢ In the User‚Äôs private area
‚Ä¢ Or via emailed download link

The product is considered ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù when the download link is made available to the User.

‚∏ª

7. Payment Models: Credits and Subscriptions

7.1. Credits
The User may purchase credit packs to generate stories.

7.2. Subscriptions
The platform offers subscription plans that include:
‚Ä¢ Automatic renewal (monthly or yearly)
‚Ä¢ Included credits or generation minutes

The User may cancel their subscription anytime from their profile, preventing future renewals.

7.3. Payments
Payments are processed through external providers (e.g., Stripe).
NATUTECH does not store card or payment data.

‚∏ª

8. Price and Billing

All prices displayed on the Website include applicable taxes.
The User will automatically receive their invoice via email or in their account.

NATUTECH may modify prices at any time, without affecting past purchases.

‚∏ª

9. Withdrawal Right and Cancellations

There is NO right of withdrawal.

Under consumer law, withdrawal does not apply to:
‚Ä¢ Clearly personalized products
‚Ä¢ Digital products generated on demand
‚Ä¢ Digital content whose execution begins immediately with user consent

Therefore:
‚Ä¢ A story CANNOT be cancelled once AI generation has begun.
‚Ä¢ Payments for used credits or subscriptions are non-refundable.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions are non-refundable if cancelled before the end of the paid period.

‚∏ª

10. Rights over Photos and Uploaded Content

The User declares that:
‚Ä¢ They have rights/authorization to upload the images
‚Ä¢ The images do not infringe third-party rights
‚Ä¢ They do not contain prohibited content (violent, sexual, defamatory, illegal, hateful, etc.)

NATUTECH may remove content and/or block accounts in case of infringement.

‚∏ª

11. Limitation of Liability

NATUTECH shall not be liable for:
‚Ä¢ Inaccurate artistic interpretations by AI
‚Ä¢ Variations in style, tone or accuracy
‚Ä¢ Unexpected results inherent to AI content
‚Ä¢ Loss of access if the User forgets their password
‚Ä¢ Damages arising from improper Website use

Total liability is limited to the amount paid by the User for the affected service.

‚∏ª

12. Service Availability

The platform may experience:
‚Ä¢ Maintenance
‚Ä¢ Updates
‚Ä¢ Temporary outages
‚Ä¢ Technology-related AI errors

Continuous availability is not guaranteed.

‚∏ª

13. Force Majeure

NATUTECH is not responsible for failures or delays caused by circumstances beyond its reasonable control.

‚∏ª

14. Modification of Terms

We may update these Terms at any time.
The latest version will always be available on the Website.

‚∏ª

15. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms are governed by Spanish law.
Both parties submit to the courts of Val√®ncia (Spain), unless mandatory law states otherwise.

‚∏ª

16. Contact

For inquiries related to these Terms:

NATUTECH S.L.
Calle Monestir de Poblet, N¬∫ 46, Puerta 2
46015 ‚Äì Val√®ncia (Valencia)
Email: cuentia@cuentia

CookiePolicyPage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicyPage.content:
√öltima actualizaci√≥n: [30 de noviembre de 2025]

1. ¬øQu√© son las cookies?

Las cookies son peque√±os archivos de texto que se almacenan en el navegador del usuario cuando visita un sitio web. Sirven para que la p√°gina recuerde informaci√≥n sobre la visita (como el idioma elegido o el estado de la sesi√≥n), y en algunos casos permiten garantizar la seguridad de las transacciones.

En esta Pol√≠tica tambi√©n se incluyen otras tecnolog√≠as de almacenamiento similares, como el almacenamiento local del navegador (Local Storage, Session Storage, IndexedDB), que se utilizan con fines similares.

‚∏ª

2. ¬øQui√©n es el responsable del tratamiento?

El responsable del tratamiento de los datos personales asociados al uso de cookies en este sitio web es:

Empresa: NATUTECH, S.L.
CIF: B24793663
Domicilio: CALLE MONESTIR DE POBLET, NUM 46, PUERTA 2, 46015, VAL√àNCIA (Valencia), Espa√±a
Correo de contacto: cuentia@cuentia.net

‚∏ª

3. ¬øQu√© tipos de cookies existen?

A nivel general, las cookies se pueden clasificar en:

a) Seg√∫n qui√©n las gestione:
‚Ä¢ Cookies propias: se env√≠an al equipo terminal del usuario desde un dominio gestionado por el propio editor de la web.
